original_theorem:
Suppose that  $f$ is infinitely differentiable on an interval $I$ and
\begin{equation}\label{eq:4.5.18}
\lim_{n\to\infty}\frac{r^n}{ n!}\|f^{(n)}\|_I=0.
\end{equation}
Then$,$ if $x_0\in I^0,$ the Taylor series
$$
\sum^\infty_{n=0}\frac{f^{(n)}(x_0)}{ n!} (x-x_0)^n
$$
 converges uniformly to $f$ on
$$
I_r=I\cap [x_0-r,x_0+r].
$$

```lean4
    {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {I : Set ‚Ñù} {x‚ÇÄ r : ‚Ñù}
    (hI_conn : IsConnected I)
    (hf_diff : ContDiffOn ‚Ñù ‚ä§ f I)
    (hx‚ÇÄ_int : x‚ÇÄ ‚àà interior I)
    (hr_nonneg : 0 ‚â§ r)
    (h_deriv_bdd : ‚àÄ n, BddAbove (norm '' (iteratedDeriv n f '' I)))
    (h_lim : Tendsto (fun n ‚Ü¶ r ^ n / n! * sSup (norm '' (iteratedDeriv n f '' I))) atTop (ùìù 0)) :
  TendstoUniformlyOn
    (fun N : ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ fun x ‚Ü¶ ‚àë n in Finset.range N, (iteratedDeriv n f x‚ÇÄ / (n! : ‚Ñù)) * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ n)
    f atTop (I ‚à© Set.Icc (x‚ÇÄ - r) (x‚ÇÄ + r)) := by
```

    {f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {I : Set ‚Ñù} {x‚ÇÄ r : ‚Ñù}
    (hI_conn : IsConnected I)
    (hf_diff : ContDiffOn ‚Ñù ‚ä§ f I)
    (hx‚ÇÄ_int : x‚ÇÄ ‚àà interior I)
    (hr_nonneg : 0 ‚â§ r)
    (h_deriv_bdd : ‚àÄ n, BddAbove (norm '' (iteratedDeriv n f '' I)))
    (h_lim : Tendsto (fun n ‚Ü¶ r ^ n / n! * sSup (norm '' (iteratedDeriv n f '' I))) atTop (ùìù 0)) :
  TendstoUniformlyOn
    (fun N : ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ fun x ‚Ü¶ ‚àë n in Finset.range N, (iteratedDeriv n f x‚ÇÄ / (n! : ‚Ñù)) * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ n)

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
‚Ä¢ $f$ is infinitely differentiable on an interval $I$ [tc_1].
‚Ä¢ $x_0$ is a point in the interior of $I$ [tc_3].
‚Ä¢ The n-th Taylor polynomial of $f$ centered at $x_0$ is $T_n(x; x_0) = \sum^n_{k=0}\frac{f^{(k)}(x_0)}{ k!} (x-x_0)^k$ [def_1a].
‚Ä¢ The interval $I_r$ is defined as $I_r = I \cap [x_0-r, x_0+r]$ [def_1b].
Therefore, we conclude:
‚Ä¢ For any $n \ge 0$, the supremum norm of the remainder satisfies $\|f-T_n(x;x_0)\|_{I_r} \le \frac{r^{n+1}}{(n+1)!}\|f^{(n+1)}\|_I$ [l1].

  ¬∑ subst hN_zero
    simp only [Finset.range_zero, Finset.sum_empty, sub_zero, norm_zero, Nat.factorial_zero,
      Nat.cast_one, pow_zero, div_one, one_mul, iteratedDeriv_zero]
    exact le_csSup_of_mem (h_deriv_bdd 0) (Set.mem_image_of_mem _ (Set.mem_image_of_mem _ hx.1))
  ¬∑ have hN_pos : 1 ‚â§ N := Nat.one_le_of_ne_zero hN_zero
    rw [show (‚àë k in Finset.range N,
          (iteratedDeriv k f x‚ÇÄ / (k! : ‚Ñù)) * (x - x‚ÇÄ) ^ k) = (taylor ‚Ñù f x‚ÇÄ (N - 1)) x by
        rw [taylor, Nat.sub_add_cancel hN_pos]]
    have h_conv := hI_conn.convex
    have hx‚ÇÄ_in_I := interior_subset hx‚ÇÄ_int
    refine le_trans (convex_domain_taylor_mean_value_thm_bound (hf_diff.of_le <| WithTop.coe_le_top _)
        hN_pos h_conv hx.1 hx‚ÇÄ_in_I) ?_
    gcongr
    ¬∑ exact abs_sub_le_of_mem_Icc hx.2
    ¬∑ have h_seg_sub_I : segment ‚Ñù x‚ÇÄ x ‚äÜ I := h_conv.segment_subset hx‚ÇÄ_in_I hx.1
      have : EqOn (iteratedDerivWithin N f (segment ‚Ñù x‚ÇÄ x)) (iteratedDeriv N f) (segment ‚Ñù x‚ÇÄ x) := by
        intro y hy

          with ‚ü®g, hg_diff, hg_eq‚ü©
        refine (iteratedDerivWithin_congr_of_eventually (hg_eq y (h_seg_sub_I hy))).trans ?_
        refine ((hg_diff.contDiffOn.iteratedDerivWithin_eq_iteratedDeriv uniqueDiffOn_univ
          isOpen_univ (Set.mem_univ y))).trans ?_
        exact (iteratedDeriv_congr_of_eventually (hg_eq y (h_seg_sub_I hy))).symm
      rw [Set.image_congr this.image_eq]
      refine csSup_le_csSup_of_subset (h_deriv_bdd N) ?_ (Set.image_mono (Set.image_mono h_seg_sub_I))
      exact (Set.nonempty_segment.image _).image _
